text: Hi, not sure if this is the right place to post, but just published a blogpost comparing Julia with R and Python and would like to share it with you. Any feedback is welcome. Thanks! (open access) <https://towardsdatascience.com/r-vs-python-vs-julia-90456a2bcbab>

attachments.title: R vs. Python vs. Julia
attachments.text: How easy it is to write efficient code?
attachments.fallback: Medium: R vs. Python vs. Julia

text:

couldn't agree more!  nice article overall!

text: Nice article. Minor comment: `vec_search(vec, x) = any(vec .== x)` is better implemented as `vec_search(vec, x) = any(==(x), vec)` . That should bring it in line with the other approaches

elements.text: . That should bring it in line with the other approaches
